    • initialStudentPlacement

      @RepeatedTest(10) void initialStudentPlacement()
      Test that given random starting island, method correctly distributes students Creates a new Archipelago, retrieves IslandTile index containing MotherNature and its opposite. Checks that those are empty, then checks another random IslandTile to see if a student was correctly placed
